statements: SELECT * FROM temperature_humidity_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM temperature_humidity_data WHERE timestamp > '2023-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM temperature_humidity_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT * FROM temperature_humidity_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_hum FROM temperature_humidity_data;
SELECT * FROM temperature_humidity_data WHERE timestamp > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM temperature_humidity_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS data_points FROM temperature_humidity_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 ORDER BY data_points DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM temperature_humidity_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-31' GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM temperature_humidity_data WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND timestamp >= '2021-11-01' AND temperature < 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature FROM temperature_conditions WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM humidity_conditions WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, humidity, timestamp FROM humidity_conditions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_conditions WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature FROM temperature_conditions;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_conditions WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM temperature_conditions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, humidity, timestamp FROM humidity_conditions WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY humidity ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_sensors, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM temperature_conditions GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_temp > 30;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM humidity_conditions GROUP BY sensor_id, timestamp HAVING avg_humidity < 50 ORDER BY sensor_id, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_sensors;
SELECT location, temperature FROM temperature_sensors WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, location, humidity FROM humidity_sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT data_id, sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(temperature), MIN(temperature) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING MAX(temperature) > 30;
SELECT * FROM temperature_sensors WHERE location='Room A' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, temperature FROM temperature_sensors WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) as avg_temp FROM temperature_sensors GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY avg_temp DESC;
SELECT MAX(temperature) as max_temp, MIN(temperature) as min_temp FROM temperature_sensors;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data INNER JOIN humidity_sensors ON sensor_data.sensor_id = humidity_sensors.sensor_id WHERE humidity > 60 ORDER BY location ASC, humidity DESC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_conditions ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT location_id, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT location_id, humidity FROM humidity_conditions WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT location_id, facility_name, facility_manager FROM storage_facilities;
SELECT * FROM temperature_conditions ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_id, humidity FROM humidity_conditions WHERE humidity > 70;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature < 20 AND date_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_id, facility_name FROM storage_facilities WHERE facility_manager LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM temperature_conditions WHERE location_id = (SELECT location_id FROM storage_facilities WHERE facility_name = 'Warehouse A');
SELECT * FROM storage_facility;
SELECT facility_name, temperature_sensor_id, humidity_sensor_id FROM storage_facility;
SELECT * FROM temperature_sensor ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT facility_name, humidity_value FROM humidity_sensor WHERE humidity_value > 70;
SELECT packaging.product_name, storage_facility.facility_name, packaging.expiration_date FROM packaging JOIN storage_facility ON packaging.storage_facility_id = storage_facility.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM storage_facility;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name FROM storage_facility ORDER BY facility_id DESC;

SELECT storage_facility.facility_id, facility_name, temperature_value FROM storage_facility INNER JOIN temperature_sensor ON storage_facility.temperature_sensor_id = temperature_sensor.sensor_id WHERE temperature_value > 20;

SELECT packaging.product_name, expiration_date, storage_facility.facility_name FROM packaging JOIN storage_facility ON packaging.storage_facility_id = storage_facility.facility_id WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';

SELECT packaging.product_name, storage_facility.facility_name, temperature_value, humidity_value FROM packaging JOIN storage_facility ON packaging.storage_facility_id = storage_facility.facility_id JOIN temperature_sensor ON storage_facility.temperature_sensor_id = temperature_sensor.sensor_id JOIN humidity_sensor ON storage_facility.humidity_sensor_id = humidity_sensor.sensor_id;
